[00:00.00]PUPPET (Explicit) - Tyler, The Creator
[00:00.46]Lyrics by：Tyler Okonma/Kanye West/David Smith
[00:00.93]Composed by：Tyler Okonma/Kanye West/David Smith
[00:01.40]Ayo
[00:03.35]I wanna talk I wanna call you and talk
[00:05.11]I wanna walk to your front door and knock
[00:06.83]After I stop my vehicle
[00:07.82]Drive to your city 'cause we live an hour apart
[00:09.80]Land at your driveway and put it in park
[00:11.20]Then do the third line of this verse
[00:12.38]Then back to my house and we pack up our bikes
[00:13.92]And we ride through the park chase the sun
[00:15.21]That's all I want other than air
[00:16.73]Oxygen air financial freedom yeah
[00:18.80]I want your company I need your company
[00:20.91]I want you to want for me
[00:21.74]I can't maneuver without you next to me
[00:24.16]It's so complex to me
[00:27.71]What do you need
[00:28.35]Do you need bread
[00:29.12]Do you need this
[00:29.95]Do you need a hug
[00:30.46]Do you need to be alone
[00:31.89]I could wrap this up and get the f**k away instead
[00:33.90]What is your wish
[00:35.19]It can be granted
[00:36.79]You're number one one on my list
[00:38.40]To you I'm Santa
[00:39.38]Where is Rudolph
[00:40.05]You're parasitic
[00:42.00]I do not have self control
[00:43.49]I am startin' to wonder
[00:45.00]Is this my free will or yours
[00:46.57]Yours yours yours
[00:52.42]I'm your puppet you control me
[00:58.57]I'm your puppet I don't know me
[01:04.26]Did I wait too long
[01:05.11]I'm your puppet
[01:07.15]Did I wait too long
[01:08.30]You control me
[01:10.30]Did I wait too long
[01:11.11]I'm your puppet
[01:13.60]Did I wait too long
[01:14.48]I'm lonely
[01:17.06]'Cause I'm your puppet
[01:18.29]Puppet oh
[01:20.40]You control me
[01:21.26]Control me
[01:23.34]I'm your puppet
[01:24.40]Puppet
[01:26.45]I don't know
[01:29.63]I'm your puppet
[01:31.98]Did I wait too long
[01:35.87]Puppet
[01:39.15]Hooo
[01:42.75]You lost son and you've been tryna find your way to me
[01:45.45]Ayy to me he's on somethin' that I hate to see
[01:48.83]A to Z nah son I'm gonna take a breathe
[01:51.94]Run a 'thon I just nothin' I'ma take the breathe
[01:55.06]Ahh on a see
[01:56.45]Aahh on a me
[01:58.20]First light the w**d
[01:59.47]First I wan't be
[02:00.96]First you could be
[02:02.80]First you could be
[02:03.50]Yeah we 'bout to scream
[02:04.89]Oh Lord
[02:06.95]La la la la
[02:11.65]La la la
[02:17.76]La la
[02:18.79]Breathe on a song
[02:20.21]La la la la la la
[02:24.73]Breathe on a song
[02:26.74]Cut me loose
[02:42.53]La la la
[02:45.14]La la la la la la la la
[02:50.43]Cut me loose yeah yeah yeah yeah
[02:56.94]But at some point you come
data.trans:
[ti:PUPPET (Explicit)]
[ar:Tyler, The Creator]
[al:IGOR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.46]//
[00:00.93]//
[00:01.40]//
[00:03.35]我想和你谈谈 想给你打电话
[00:05.11]我想径直走到你家门口 然后敲门
[00:06.83]我不在胡思乱想
[00:07.82]开车去找你 我们的家只隔着一小时的车程
[00:09.80]驶入你的私人车道 把车停下
[00:11.20]开启新的章节
[00:12.38]回到我家 装好我们的自行车
[00:13.92]穿越公园 追逐阳光
[00:15.21]这就是我梦寐以求的东西 比赖以生存的空气更重要
[00:16.73]氧气 财务自由 是我想要的
[00:18.80]我想要你陪着我 我需要你的陪伴
[00:20.91]我想那个处处为我着想的你
[00:21.74]没有你在我身边 我动弹不得
[00:24.16]对我而言 这太难了
[00:27.71]你到底需要什么
[00:28.35]你需要钱财吗
[00:29.12]你需要吗
[00:29.95]你需要温暖的拥抱吗
[00:30.46]你想要独处吗
[00:31.89]我可以把这些都给你 不愿离开
[00:33.90]你的愿望是什么
[00:35.19]有一点可以肯定
[00:36.79]你是我最想得到的
[00:38.40]对你而言 我是圣诞老人
[00:39.38]为圣诞老人驾车的麋鹿在哪里
[00:40.05]形影不离
[00:42.00]我控制不住自己
[00:43.49]我甚至开始怀疑
[00:45.00]是我掌控了自己的意志 还是由你掌控
[00:46.57]是你
[00:52.42]我是你的傀儡 由你掌控
[00:58.57]我是你的傀儡 丧失自我
[01:04.26]是不是我等得太久了
[01:05.11]我是你的傀儡
[01:07.15]是不是我等得太久了
[01:08.30]由你掌控
[01:10.30]是不是我等得太久了
[01:11.11]我是你的傀儡
[01:13.60]是不是我等得太久了
[01:14.48]我很孤独
[01:17.06]我是你的傀儡
[01:18.29]傀儡
[01:20.40]由你掌控
[01:21.26]操纵我
[01:23.34]我是你的傀儡
[01:24.40]傀儡
[01:26.45]丧失自我
[01:29.63]我是你的傀儡
[01:31.98]是不是我等得太久了
[01:35.87]傀儡
[01:39.15]//
[01:42.75]孩子 你迷失方向 你坚持自己的方式 试图与我比肩
[01:45.45]与我比肩 他一直做的事 是我不愿看到的
[01:48.83]自始至终 我想喘口气 休息一下
[01:51.94]长途跋涉 抛弃一切 我想喘口气 休息一下
[01:55.06]看看
[01:56.45]看着我
[01:58.20]首先 点燃一根**
[01:59.47]首先 我不想
[02:00.96]首先 你可以
[02:02.80]首先 你可以
[02:03.50]我们破口大骂
[02:04.89]上帝啊
[02:06.95]//
[02:11.65]//
[02:17.76]//
[02:18.79]在这首歌里尽情释放
[02:20.21]//
[02:24.73]在这首歌里尽情释放
[02:26.74]摆脱束缚
[02:42.53]//
[02:45.14]//
[02:50.43]摆脱束缚
[02:56.94]可在某一瞬间 你又恢复理智
